verbose_text: In DHEA treated LNCaP cells at lower passage numbers (22 passages or less), transcriptome expression of HSD17B6 and 17beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase type 4 (HSD17B4), which also has 3alpha- HSD oxidase activity, showed far less changes (XREF_FIG) than in cells at higher passage numbers (32 passages or more), where HSD17B6 mRNA expression was up-regulated (XREF_FIG).
